name.ja: スライドショー タブ

short.ar: امتداد الكروم لعرض الشرائح المفتوحة لعلامات التبويب
short.am,bg,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: A Chromium extension to slideshow open tabs.
short.bn: খোলা ট্যাবগুলি স্লাইডশো করার জন্য একটি ক্রোমিয়াম এক্সটেনশন৷
short.es: Una extensión de Chromium para mostrar pestañas abiertas.
short.fr: Une extension Chromium pour les onglets ouverts du diaporama.
short.hi: टैब खोलने के लिए स्लाइड शो के लिए क्रोमियम एक्सटेंशन।
short.id: Ekstensi Chromium untuk menampilkan tab yang terbuka.
short.ja: スライドショーの開いているタブへの クロム 拡張機能。
short.nl: Een Chromium-extensie om geopende tabbladen te diashowen.
short.pt_BR: Uma extensão do Chromium para guias abertas de apresentação de slides.
short.ru: Расширение Chromium для слайд-шоу открытых вкладок.
short.ta: திறந்த தாவல்களை ஸ்லைடுஷோ செய்வதற்கான குரோமியம் நீட்டிப்பு.
short.zh_CN: 幻灯片打开选项卡的 铬 扩展。

long.ar,bn,es,fr,hi,id,ja,nl,pt_BR,ru,ta,zh_C:
This extension slide shows tabs on all open windows.

Version - 1.0
- Run slide show on all windows with given timeout. 
- Supports audio and only active tab is un-mute and all other tabs are muted.
- Remembers user preference

Version - 2.0
- Upgraded to Manifest V3
- Added feature to slideshow on launch of browser or new window (Only works on all open windows).
- Added feature to slideshow on selective window

Version - 3.0
- Added support for 13 widely spoken languages

All appreciation and applause to my family !
long.am,bg,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
This extension slide shows tabs on all open windows.

Version - 1.0
- Run slide show on all windows with given timeout. 
- Supports audio and only active tab is un-mute and all other tabs are muted.
- Remembers user preference

Version - 2.0
- Upgraded to Manifest V3
- Added feature to slideshow on launch of browser or new window (Only works on all open windows).
- Added feature to slideshow on selective window

Version - 3.0
- Added support for 13 widely spoken languages

All appreciation and applause to my family !

If you like my work, you can support me through below link
